titleStmt.title: A continuation of the diurnall passages in Ireland declared in tvvo letters. The one being sent from the Lord Antrim in Ireland, to the right honourable the Earle of Rutland, dated February 25 1641. The other was sent to Sir Robert King knight, bearing date the 27 of February, 1641.

A continuation of the diurnall passages in Ireland declared in tvvo letters. The one being sent from the Lord Antrim in Ireland, to the right honourable the Earle of Rutland, dated February 25 1641. The other was sent to Sir Robert King knight, bearing date the 27 of February, 1641.
titleStmt.author: Antrim, Randal MacDonnell, Earl of, 1609-1683.
Loftus, Edward, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles and T. Banks,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: blurred print with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

A coppy of a letter from the Lord Antrim in Ireland sent to the right honourable the Earle of Rutland, dated the 25 of February 1641 -- Ioyfull newes from Ireland, or a true relation of the great overthrow which the English gave the revesl before Drogheda, &c.
